tips.title: üèÜ Winners' Castlist
tips.description: Create a Custom Castlist ordered by Season
tips.showcase:
# ‚ú® CastBot New Features (1/10)
-# v3.0

**üèÜ Winners' Castlist**
Create a Custom Castlist ordered by Season!

**üß© How to setup**
‚Ä¢ Create a Winner role as well as a role for each season
‚Ä¢ Create a new Castlist and choose Sorting Method 'Vanity Role', set Season to 'No Season' and add the "Winner" role you created to as a Tribe on the castlist. Ensure each player has that winner role assigned.
‚Ä¢ From `/menu` > Players > Select each winner > click Vanity Role > select Vanity Role for their Season

tips.title: üìã Dynamic Castlists
tips.description: Organize cast members with placements, alumni, and custom formatting
tips.showcase:
# ‚ú® CastBot New Features (2/10)
-# v3.0

**üìã Dynamic Castlists**
Organize cast members with placements, alumni, and custom formatting

**üß© How to setup**
‚Ä¢ Create a Discord role for your alumni (e.g., "Season 1 Alumni")
‚Ä¢ Go to `/menu` > Production Menu > Castlist Hub > Create New Castlist
‚Ä¢ Name it (e.g., "S1 Cast"), add your alumni role as a tribe
‚Ä¢ Click "Tribes & Placements" to edit player rankings (1st, 2nd, 14th, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Players automatically sort by placement - perfect for Hall of Fame displays!
